name: Kontact Data
overview:
ABOUT US Kontact Data’s business is built on a foundation of opt-in and permission based direct marketing and we are committed to ensuring the highest possible standards are maintained across the industry.

OUR APPROACH At Kontact Data, our ultimate goal is for all our clients to regard us as being the best provider of customer contact solutions for their business. We do this through a broad range of permission based direct marketing campaigns, as well as opt in contact through data collection. Our network of lead generation websites, as well as our UK based call centres ensure we meet the mark, every time. By listening to our clients we learn which areas we need to work on, to further enhance performance and deliver greater benefits for our clients and most importantly, providing data of a consistent quality.

OUR PEOPLE Our success is testament to the growing importance and maturing of online communication, which now takes pride of place in the traditional direct marketing mix. It is also testament to the vision and innovation of our team, many of whom have been specialists in the field since the very conception of email direct marketing, and lifestyle databases before that. Kontact Data’s team now includes in-house designers, programmers and production consultants - based at our offices in central London.
